entry.title: Pineapple + Sage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Seminole Candle Company
Type:
Price: 6.00 - 25.00 (3 variants)

Our limited edition Pineapple + Sage fragrance is sweet, fruity, and earthy. Rooted in fresh sage leaves and the awe inspiring pineapple fields of Hawaii, this fragrance evokes that “Aloha Friday” feeling of freedom until Monday! Available in 4 oz. travel tins, 11 oz., and 21 oz. signature jars. For best results and cleanest burning, wick must be trimmed to 1/4" regularly.

entry.title: Custom Silver Tins
entry.summary:
Vendor: Seminole Candle Company
Type:
Price: 144.00

Minimum: 24 Candles 

Turnaround Time: 2 Weeks  

With a highly fragrant 30+ hour burn time, our signature silver tins are the perfect accent to your event. Pick your fragrance, and let us know a few details around your event. Send us your 2x2 round label design if you'd like, or take advantage of our complimentary design services to create a one-of-a-kind candle! You can also book a consultation at our West Columbia, SC shop by clicking HERE! 

Did you know that your olfactory sense, or sense of smell, is directly linked to memory? We remember fragrances more accurately than visual memories, and can be instantly transported back to an experience or memory with a simple whiff. Make your wedding, special event, venue, or retail space unforgettable by partnering with Seminole Candle Company!

entry.title: Sandstorm Cinnamon
entry.summary:
Vendor: Seminole Candle Company
Type:
Price: 22.00

This University of South Carolina officially licensed Gamecocks candle is as spirited as Williams-Brice Stadium on game day - making it the perfect alumni, fan, or graduation gift! It is a warm, spicy, signature fragrance infused with cinnamon leaf and cassia essential oils. Each candle features 2 all natural cotton wicks and is hand poured in 16 oz. reusable tins, providing over 100 hours of cinnamon filled aromatherapy!

entry.title: Citronella
entry.summary:
Vendor: Seminole Candle Company
Type:
Price: 22.00


Keep mosquitoes at bay with our 16 oz. triple wicked Citronella candle! This isn't your average insect repelling candle, because it's a handcrafted blend of essential and fragrance oils created by Seminole Candle Company. Within minutes of lighting, your outdoor area is illuminated by aromatherapeutic flames that drive insects away.

Fragrance Notes:

Top: Orange and lemon

Middle: Eucalyptus 

Bottom: Citronella

entry.title: Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Seminole Candle Company
Type:
Price: 5.00

Enjoy your favorite Seminole Candle Company fragrances without the worry of leaving a burning candle unattended! Designed for use with electric warmers, our highly fragrant wax melts will deliver over 48 hours of aromatherapy per cube. That's over 288 hours per 6-pack!  

Tips & Tricks:

  • Mix, match, and melt to create your own scent. One of our favorite blends is Lemon Verbena with Cucumber Mint -  it's so clean and refreshing! For something more earthy, Burnished Leather and White Jasmine are also incredible when combined.
  • Save the packaging to easily change fragrances.
    • Melt wax completely in warming dish.
    • Pour melted wax back into original packaging to reform wax.
    • Clean dish with a paper towel {while it's still warm}.
  • Due to risk of overheating, it's advised to not burn candles once they've  burned down to 1/2" from the bottom of the vessel. Recycle that remaining wax and packaging by making your own wax melts!
    • Warm vessel on the candle warming plate {if it's a 2 in 1 warmer} OR on a cookie sheet in the oven {lowest heat setting} until wax is completely melted. Do NOT microwave container candles - wick tabs are metal.
    • Pour wax into package and let cool. Once solidified, store in a cool place for later use.

entry.title: Empire Apple
entry.summary:
Vendor: Seminole Candle Company
Type:
Price: 6.00 - 25.00 (3 variants)

Empire apples are red, sweet, juicy, crunchy hybrids of McIntosh and Red Delicious apples from the "Empire State," New York. This candle smells like the crisp first bite of a freshly picked Empire apple. Our delicious apple fragrance makes the perfect gift for educators, daycare providers, new home owners, or yourself! Available in 4 oz. travel tins, 11 oz., and 21 oz. signature jars. For best results and cleanest burning, wick must be trimmed to 1/4" regularly.
